title: Figuring Out Numerals
content:
Figuring Out Numerals by Yves Peters over on The FontFeed ...is an awesome article.

[http://fontfeed.com/archives/figuring-out-numerals/](http://web.archive.org/web/20130819103321/http:/fontfeed.com/archives/figuring-out-numerals/ "http://fontfeed.com/archives/figuring-out-numerals/")

I have a client wanting to display their family name and house number so instead of using my usual text setting one-click method ...or my hey this looks awesome method... I though I'd take the morning and study the subject matter and came across that article.

Now I know more than I should ;)

n.
author: 5star
